resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/156652</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>156652</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2796</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Classroom Court</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klassenzimmer-Gericht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cour de Salle de classe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Corte Da Sala de aula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Corte Dell'Aula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δικαστήριο τάξεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corte De la Sala de clase</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A listening activity consisting of a recorded dialogue in which there is an argument. Students listen and must , decide who is right and suggest a solution</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">listening comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dialog</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">argument</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine hörende Aktivität, die aus einem 
gespeicherten Dialog besteht, in dem es ein Argument gibt. 
Kursteilnehmer hören und müssen, zu entscheiden wem Recht ist 
und eine Lösung vorzuschlagen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une activité d'écoute se composant d'un 
dialogue enregistré dans lequel il y a un argument. Les 
étudiants écoutent et doivent, décider qui est le juste et 
suggérer une solution</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atividade escutando que consiste em um 
diálogo gravado em que há um argumento. Os estudantes escutam 
e devem, para decidir-se quem é a direita e para sugerir uma 
solução</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'attività ascoltante che consiste di un 
dialogo registrato in cui ci è un argomento. Gli allievi 
ascoltano e devono, decidere chi è destra e suggerire una soluzione</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια δραστηριότητα ακούσματος που αποτελείται από ένα 
καταγραμμένο διαλογικό παράθυρο στο οποίο υπάρχει ένα όρισμα. 
Οι σπουδαστές ακούνε και πρέπει, να αποφασίσουν ποιος είναι
σωστός και προτείνουν μια λύση</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una actividad que escucha que consiste en un 
diálogo registrado en el cual hay un argumento. Los estudiantes
escuchan y deben, decidir quién el correcto y sugerir una solución</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">hörendes Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dialog</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Argument</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension d'écoute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dialogue</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">argument</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão escutando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">diálogo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">argumento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione ascoltante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dialogo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">argomento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ακούσματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προφορική έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαλογικό παράθυρο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">όρισμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comprensión que escucha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">diálogo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">argumento</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
